attributes.action: Make it a criminal act for someone to falsify a childs legal surname without full parental responsibility consent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Children should have a legal right to their identity just like adults. Nowadays identity theft is a criminal act. Robbing a child of their identity should also apply as identity theft. Any attempts by an individual to falsify a childs legal surname on legal records such as school, doctor, dentist etc should be a criminal act.
I have had the experience where my 7 year old son was masquerading by another surname at his primary school for two months before he 
told me. Although exciting to him, I was disgusted that this should be allowed. 
A child's identity is a basic right that should be protected & enforced.
